properties.Name: JournalEntryLineItem
properties.Description:
The Journal Entry is broken down into a series of Journal Entry Line Items. 

The total amount of all Journal Entry Line Items for a Journal Entry must be 0 (I.e. the debits = credits).

Journal entries are 'posted' to the ledger.

Columns.Name: JournalId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Journal.

Columns.Name: JournalEntryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Journal Entry.

Columns.Name: JournalEntryLineItemId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Journal Entry Line Item.

Columns.Name: JournalEntryLineItemDescription
Columns.Description: A description of the journal entry line item.

Columns.Name: CreditOrDebitIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the journal entity line item is a credit or debit.

Columns.Name: Amount
Columns.Description: The amount either a credit or debit to the account.

Columns.Name: LedgerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger.

Columns.Name: LedgerAccountNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account.

Columns.Name: PostingTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp of the posting of the journal entry to the Ledger Account.

Columns.Name: PostingNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the ledger posting.

Properties.Description:
The Journal Entry is broken down into a series of Journal Entry Line Items. 

The total amount of all Journal Entry Line Items for a Journal Entry must be 0 (I.e. the debits = credits).

Journal entries are 'posted' to the ledger.
